title: 11/30/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 11/30/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Week 12 in the NFL. Did the league make the right decision by making the Saints and Broncos play yesterday? Should there be concern surrounding the Bucs? We're joined by NBC's Peter King, The Tampa Bay Times' Rick Stroud, Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix, and Former NFL Running Back Maurice Jones-Drew. Plus, who could we see Mike Tyson step into a ring with next?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
